    • Constructor Detail

      • SaverConfig

        public SaverConfig(ConfigurationProvider provider)
        Configurator constructor
        Parameters:
        provider - configuration provider that will supply all the constants for the saver

      • SaverConfig

        public SaverConfig(int unitThreshold,
                   int refresh,
                   DBConfig dbConfig,
                   int portionSize)
        Full constructor
        Parameters:
        unitThreshold - amount of units after getting which saver will fetch this amount of units from aggregator
        refresh - amount of time units(by now: seconds) after which saver will try to fetch 'portion size' of units from aggregator
        dbConfig - configuration for database adapter which saver will use to store data in a database
        portionSize - amount of data that saver will take after a single request to an aggregator

      • getUnitThreshold

        public int getUnitThreshold()
        Get amount of units after getting which saver will fetch this amount of units from aggregator Returned value may be equal to PlsosConstants.NO_THRESHOLD meaning that there will be no thresholding behavior.
        Returns:
        amount of units after getting which saver will fetch this amount of units from aggregator

      • setUnitThreshold

        public void setUnitThreshold(int unitThreshold)
        Set amount of units after getting which saver will fetch this amount of units from aggregator. Use PlsosConstants.NO_THRESHOLD to explicitly set that there will be no thresholding behavior.
        Parameters:
        unitThreshold - amount of units after getting which saver will fetch this amount of units from aggregator
